'''Hsarat''' ({{lang-ar|حصارات}}) (also spelled ''Hisarat'', ''Hasrat'', ''Hsarate'', ''Ḩaşrāt'', ''Hsârâte'', ''Hsarale'' or ''Ḩişārāt'') is a village in the [[Jbeil District]] of the [[Mount Lebanon Governorate]], [[Lebanon]]. Its inhabitants are predominantly [[Maronites|Maronite Catholic]]s.<ref>{{cite web|title=Elections municipales et ikhtiariah au Mont-Liban |url=http://www.localiban.org/IMG/pdf/Elections_municipales_libanaises_2010_-_Mont-Liban.pdf |website=Localiban |publisher=Localiban |accessdate=2016-02-12 |page=19 |format=pdf |date=2010 |url-status=dead |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150724081015/http://www.localiban.org/IMG/pdf/Elections_municipales_libanaises_2010_-_Mont-Liban.pdf |archivedate=2015-07-24 }}</ref>
